title: Ticket #1197: filetransfer plugins don't fail gracefully
description: if the filetransfer list was undefined, or if the plugin returned malformed data, the filetransfer code would not handle the failure correctly. in one case, it core dumps and in another continues on blissfully unaware of the error. also added nicer error propagation.
check_ins: 2010-Feb-09 20:50   Check-in [17163]: fixed filetransfer plugin bugs docuemented in #1197. (By Zach Miller )
creator: zmiller
